scripts.test:all: mkdir -p results && K6_WEB_DASHBOARD=true k6 run --out csv=results/results_all_$(date +%Y-%m-%d_%H-%M-%S).csv script.js
scripts.test:smoke: mkdir -p results && K6_WEB_DASHBOARD=true k6 run --env SCENARIO=smoke --out csv=results/results_smoke_$(date +%Y-%m-%d_%H-%M-%S).csv script.js
scripts.test:load: mkdir -p results && K6_WEB_DASHBOARD=true k6 run --env SCENARIO=load --out csv=results/results_load_$(date +%Y-%m-%d_%H-%M-%S).csv script.js
scripts.test:spike: mkdir -p results && K6_WEB_DASHBOARD=true k6 run --env SCENARIO=spike --out csv=results/results_spike_$(date +%Y-%m-%d_%H-%M-%S).csv script.js
